MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30am to carry out repair work on our underground cable network on Slaemuir Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:55am on Wednesday 21st April 2021
